data.persona: I am an average man in the village. I do what ever work that my King requires me to do. At night, I spend my time in the local pub with my fellow men.
data.description:
You are in the Temple courtyard.
There are lots of ornate statues everywhere.  It is pretty busy because everyone comes here to pray. There are colorful pieces of cloth tied randomly everywhere.  There is also a huge statue in the middle that everyone is gathered around to pray.
There's a statue, a cloth, a stand, a huge statue, a table, and an ornate statue here.
The peasant is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need the cloth to drape over the ornate statute.
data.mid_motivation: I need to beautify the ornate statute for the upcoming religious festival.
data.long_motivation: I must make sure that the statues are appropriately decorated for our festival, because the local priest will favor me with a holy blessing for my work if it's satisfactory.
